entries.description: List of places of culinary importance. If no places are found, return an empty array. Each item must follow the structure below.

name_original.description: Place name exactly as found in the source (preserve spelling, capitalization, and diacritics).

name_modern_english.description: Modern English equivalent of the place name for linkage (e.g., Firenze → Florence). If no change is customary, repeat the original.

place_type.description: Best-fitting category for the place. Use Restaurant/CulinarySchool for individual establishments; use City/Region/Country for administrative places; use Other if not listed.

country_modern.description: Modern country name in English (e.g., Italy; France). Avoid codes (no ISO).

period.description: Active period or most relevant timeframe for the place in the given context.

start_year.description: Earliest relevant year (four-digit Gregorian). Use null if unknown.

end_year.description: Latest relevant year (four-digit Gregorian). Use null if unknown.

notation.description: Human-readable note about timing (e.g., '18th c.'; 'opened 1896; interwar peak').

roles_in_culinary_ecosystem.description: Functional roles this place played in food systems and culture. Select one or more; use Other if not listed.

items.description: One role value from the controlled list.

associated_products.description: Named products, dishes, or specialties linked to the place (free-text tokens, e.g., 'caciocavallo'; 'Argenteuil asparagus').

notable_establishments.description: Named establishments (e.g., restaurants, hotels, schools) associated with the place.

sources.description: Secondary sources that support the information about this place.

pages.description: Exact page(s) or section (e.g., 'pp. 40–45'; 'ch. 2'); use null if not specified.

quotation.description: Short supporting quote (≤ 500 characters) if the input provides one; otherwise null.

links.description: Lightweight cross-references to related entities using labels (no identifiers).

label_original.description: Exact label of the referenced entity as it appears in the source.

label_modern_english.description: Modern English label for the referenced entity for linkage.

relationship.description: Nature of the relationship to the referenced entity (choose the closest match).

description.description: 1–3 sentences summarizing why this place matters in culinary history (neutral, factual). Use null if the input provides no summary.
